page.title: 07Education Stower Provost C.
page.content: Founded 1850 N.O.R. 119-from East Stour,West Stour,Stour Provost,Stour Row,Todber,Fifehead Magdallen,Kington Magna,Nyland.Children aged 5-11 years in two buses.They join Gillingham School in the September after becoming{11.Staff}Headmaster and 4 teachers.School Day 9.15-15.45. { Extras}Heated swimming pool built by ______ parents.Large playing field , tennis court.Modern hall + gymnastics equipment.Strong P.T.A. raising Â£1000 each year.D.C.C. Capitation Â£2050 p.a. {Events this year P.T.A.}Summer fete, _______________________ Jumble Sale Car Treasure Hunt,Coffee Morning. {School Regular}Events,Football,Netball ______________ Swimming Matches. Christmas Drama Production(Charlie + The Choclate Factory) Education Visits Maiden Castle,Dorchester Museum, Brownsea Island,Lyme Regis A.Centre.
